channel.title: Wtf! p chat messed up!help please! also how can i add more commands, edit serve
channel.description: Look i got this issue every time someone sends me a p chat message or to someone else it logs the person receving it out! also how can i edit server like i want to add a bank both or a person and every time i reset server it disapers. another thing is that i kick someone and they log right back in wtf is up with that? how can i add more commands please help me mod or ppl! ty i really apreciate it! im using xlinescape and if i type ::banip it dont ban there ip i have to do it myself through the folder!also i got one last error i try to mute them and it just the rule just stays selected and dont mute them?!

item.title: Wtf! p chat messed up!help please! also how can i add more commands, edit serve

by info i mean like all the saved games all the things i got on xlinescape to saitins isle were can i get saitins isle?

item.title: Wtf! p chat messed up!help please! also how can i add more commands, edit serve
item.dc:creator: @fishypoo101 fishypoo101
item.description:
@fishypoo101 wrote:

First of all, ::kickuser it kicks them from teh server, then can log back in. If you don’t want them to come back in, use ::banuser. i don’t know how to fix the Private Chat issue. What source are you using btw?

Read full topic
